item.title: "The Nature of Consciousness" by Alan Watts (Nimia 2016 Showreel)
item.description:
"The Nature of Consciousness" by Alan Watts (Nimia 2016 Showreel)

Amazing piece from Nimia. Â The power of the content creator community is available to everyone.

item.title: The Virtual Reality Renaissance: How Learning in VR Will Inspire Action Like Never Before - Singularity HUB
item.description:
The Virtual Reality Renaissance: How Learning in VR Will Inspire Action Like Never Before - Singularity HUB

6,287 5 Humanity is standing on a precipice. We have never been closer to achieving a world where everyone has the ability to live and thrive. Biotech, nanotech and AI promise to reshape the world and have the potential to imbue humanity with near-godlike powers.

item.title: Doo's cards-based productivity app arrives on Mac to help you avoid procrastination
item.description:
Doo's cards-based productivity app arrives on Mac to help you avoid procrastination

A few months ago we wrote about Doo, a cards-based productivity app that aims to help you get stuff done without overwhelming you. Now, the app has expanded from iOS to Mac, and comes with several new features - and a price drop.

item.title: There Are Now Over 200 HTC Vive VR Experiences On Steam
item.description:
There Are Now Over 200 HTC Vive VR Experiences On Steam

As of today, over 200 experiences are now listed on Steam as being compatible with Valve's co-created HTC Vive virtual reality headset.

item.title: Hitman GO VR on Oculus is The Ultimate Version of the Game
item.description:
Hitman GO VR on Oculus is The Ultimate Version of the Game

If you're not keyed into the mobile gaming scene, it would have been very easy for you to miss 2014's , a game that took the world of Hitman and shrunk it down into, essentially, a tabletop board game.

item.title: How The Growth Of Mixed Reality Will Change Communication, Collaboration And The Future Of The Workplace
item.description:
How The Growth Of Mixed Reality Will Change Communication, Collaboration And The Future Of The Workplace

Sci-fi tech, meet Wall Street. A recent report from investment bank Goldman Sachs predicted that within 10 years, virtual reality hardware will be an $80 billion industry.

item.title: I've Seen the Future - and It's Incredible
From product design to virtual reality - Google Design
A Platform-Thinking Approach to Innovation
item.description:
A Platform-Thinking Approach to Innovation

Innovation is about solving customer problems. It's been claimed that innovation is about beating the competition or about maximizing shareholder returns but if the successes (and failures) of the past decade are anything to go by, the primary goal of innovation is solving customer problems. There are three broad approaches to problem solving that innovators...
